name: Tkxel
description:

We work with venture or self-funded start-ups, small to mid-size businesses and enterprises.

Why Work With Us?
10 Years of Experience
We’ve evolved over a period of 10 years acquiring skills and expertise by designing, developing and deploying solutions for the world’s leading companies.
We Hire The Top 1% Talent
With a workforce of 200+ engineers who are experts in the latest programming languages, we have what it takes to transform your business.
A Team of Innovators
We are more than just consultants. We put our clients at the heart of what we do- left, right & center to add real value to their business.
 
Contact us today at services@tkxel.com to discuss your technology needs.
